attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public. They are explosives, dangerous in the wrong hands .Communities are terrorised at certain times of the year,but over the last several years,the incidents involving fireworks being sold and used all year round has increased significantly .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559
